org.kepler.hadoop.director

Class HadoopDirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.kernel.util.NamedObj
      • ptolemy.kernel.util.Attribute
        • ptolemy.actor.Director
          • org.kepler.ddp.director.DDPDirector
            • org.kepler.hadoop.director.HadoopDirector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Executable, Initializable, Changeable, Debuggable, DebugListener, Derivable, ModelErrorHandler, MoMLExportable, Moveable, Nameable

    public class HadoopDirector
extends DDPDirector
    A DDP director that uses the Hadoop engine to convert DDP pattern actors (Map, Reduce, Cross, CoGroup, and Match) and I/O actors (DDPDataSink and DDPDataSource) into a Hadoop job and runs it on the server.

    NOTE: Only DDP pattern and I/O actors may be present in the workflow. Other actors must placed inside the composite pattern actors or in a different sub-workflow.

    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
